name: Mega Super Shooter Combat Cat RPG Game vol 5
name_original: Mega Super Shooter Combat Cat RPG Game vol 5
description:
You can't trust anything, even your game.  You must save all your unsaved files before venturing forth.

Controls:
Usually games have WASD for movement, Mouse for selecting options, ESC for going back to menu and so on.

(Run with admin privileges for secret ending)
